company.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Final Fantasy VII Remake: Digital Deluxe Upgrade
summary:
Upgrade your purchase of FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE to include the content of the Digital Deluxe Edition, with this handy upgrade bundle.
Includes the following contents:
- Cactuar Summon Materia
- Carbuncle Summon Materia
- Digital Artbook
- Digital Mini-Soundtrack
